title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4624.7 - Nongames of chance books and records available for examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4624.7 - Nongames of chance books and records available for examination

State Regulations

Before any games of chance funds are expended for
noncharitable purposes, the licensee organization shall utilize all other
sources or potential sources of income to discharge such noncharitable and
operating expenses ordinarily incurred. Any licensee organization that is
disbursing games of chance funds for noncharitable purposes shall make its
general fund and all other books and records available for examination by the
commission or the municipal governing body or their representatives upon
request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4624.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
